issue.title: [CF 618] A 'display' icon type with a custom bar formula
issue.body:
I've seen options for bars specifically for power and timers, but I don't see an option to use a bar with a custom filling formula. Would be most useful for things like health / maxhealth, power / maxpower, xp / next level xp, and probably more creative things.

Would probably be best if there is an ability to show text on this icon type as well.


> Posted by CurseForge user NovaClaft | Imported from CurseForge issue #618 | Raw

comments.body:
This would be a possibility to either implement into the bar icon view (coming soon!) or implement into its own icon view.

It would have to be driven by a new icon type that would supply this data as well.

This is something that is in my long term plans, but I just don't know when I will get around to it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I'm going to leave this up to somebody else who wants to develop this using TMW's API.

Something like this just doesn't fit very well with the overall purpose of TMW. Everything in TMW is a timer, so having non-timers should be something left up to a third party.

You can always add these amounts as text using DogTags.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
